title: FOIL Request: Office of the Professions records for Architect license

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: FOIL Request: Office of the Professions records for Architect license
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

All releasable records in the "Professional License and Registration" subject matter listing, for the architect with license # 025826, full name Rex Andrew Heuermann, from his first application for a license to the present.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

T. McElwee

title: Stamford Police - FOIA Access Form

communications.subject: Connecticut Freedom of Information Act Request: Stamford Police - FOIA Access Form
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Connecticut Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please be so kind as to provide copies of all completed "Freedom of Information FOI Request Form,  Version 6/20/2019 "  the Stamford Police  Records Division has processed between October 27, 2022 through February 16 , 2023. Please include all redacted versions of the requested documents.

I also request that, if possible and pursuant to Conn. Gen. Stat. § 1-212(d), fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest and not made for commercial gain. The requested documents will be processed by a representative of the news media/press and made available to the public at MuckRock.com.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 4 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robert Meehan

title: Public information request

communications.subject: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Public information request
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Maryland Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Request to obtain the salary that was earned by Manuel Navarro-Montero  since August 2021. To include any and all bonuses received. 

The employee was arrested for alleged sex offense that occurred between a female student at Meade High School.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

M. W.

title: The Terrorist Screening Database temporary  records designated under NARA records schedule N1-065-10-012 / item 1 (Department of Homeland Security, Office of Intelligence & Analysis)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

This is a request under the Freedom of Information Act. I hereby request the following records:

Any and all correspondence, reports, and documents discussing the criteria to be added to the Terrorist Screening Database and all subsets.

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public free of charge as part of the public information service at MuckRock.com, processed by a representative of the news media/press and is made in the process of news gathering and not for commercial usage.

1, The Terrorist Screening Database temporary  records designated under NARA records schedule N1-065-10-012 / item 1 

2, The Terror Screening Database Criteria request

3, Who is the originating agency who placed me on the (TSDB) before they are are disposed  when they have met the retention time designated in their records schedule.
because warrants granted under 18 USC 2518(8)(d) where the government must inform the person object of the warrant that his or her communications were collected via FISA Court and withholding these documents will  deny  me of my rights to a fair trail to prove my innocents.

 4, The Terror watch list

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kwmane Mays

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kwmane deon mays

title: 2004 Dispatch Logs

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: 2004 Dispatch Logs
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The entirety of the Sevier County Sheriff’s Dispatch Log from 12/23/2004 and 12/24/2004.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Katie King.

title: Request for Stamford police/incident reports

communications.subject: Connecticut Freedom of Information Act Request: Request for Stamford police/incident reports
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Connecticut Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all police reports, incident reports, and any other police documentation related to police activity at the address of 296 Sylvan Knoll Road, Stamford, CT 06902 for the dates between May 1, 2022, to July 12, 2023.

I also request that, if possible and pursuant to Conn. Gen. Stat. § 1-212(d), fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest and not made for commercial gain. The requested documents will be processed by a representative of the news media/press and made available to the public at MuckRock.com.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 4 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sabrina Buckwalter

title: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Irving Police Department)

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Irving Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

communications.subject: RE: [External] Texas Public Information Act Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Irving Police Department)
communications.communication:
Good morning,



Please submit your open records request at https://irvingtx.justfoia.com/publicportal/home/newrequest



This is our new portal that we will be using moving forward.



Let me know if you have any questions.



Thanks


Jocelyn C. Portillo | Senior Records Clerk
City of Irving |Police Department
305 N. O’Connor Road. Irving, TX 75061
P: (972) 721-2437   F: (972) 721-3635
jportillo@cityofirving.org<mailto:jportillo@cityofirving.org> | CityofIrving.org<http://inet.cityofirving.org/DocumentCenter/View/112/cityofirving.org>

Thank you,

[OSU logo]
Records Unit

901 Woody Hayes Dr.
Columbus, OH 43210
